dc_description_s: This feature layer contains Linn County, Iowa planimetric polygon features. This layer contains all planimetric features, which may include the following types of features:BuildingsDrivewaysSidewalksRoad PavementBridge PavementFeature Layer DetailsUpdate Frequency: As neededFeature Class Coordinate System: NAD 1983 (2011) Iowa North State Plane (wkid: 6463)Max Visibility Scale: NoneMin Visibility Scale: 1:20,000Max Features Returned: 2,000Additional ResourcesVisit Linn County, Iowa on the web.Visit Linn County, Iowa GIS on the web.Visit the Linn County, Iowa GIS portal. This site is updated as needed to reflect maps, apps, and data of interest from various County departments.Contact InformationQuestions  Contact the GIS Division by phone at 319.892.5250 or by email.
